name: Waking Gerald
description:
Gerald awoke in a strange and unusual environment. Where was he? As he scanned the world around him, he became faintly aware of the scent of fruit.  His giraffe nostrils twitching, he turned to face the largest banana he had ever seen! 

You've been placed in a dream! Don't let the scenery distract you, there is danger about. You would do well to avoid the nightmares and fruit for as long as you can. After all, it would be sad to die in your sleep because of a giant banana.

Navigate the dream, kill the nightmares, and stay alive for as long as possible!

*************** Waking Gerald ***************

Game Objective: Stay in your dream for as long as possible

Controls: A and D to move with Left Shift to dash, SPACE to jump, LEFT-MOUSE to shoot

NOTE : you are able to triple-jump in the air which is necessary to progress.

(Created for a 48-hour game jam)

Programming :: Jon Fisher

Art :: Sophia Fisher

Testing :: Adrian Fisher
